notes_from_coach: BMI: 24.2 (normal). Split: Tue Push, Wed Pull, Thu Legs, Fri Upper, Sat Full Body. Track weights weekly: +5-10% per phase (base→increase 10-20%→peak +supersets→maintain→deload -20%). Log actuals. Increase weight next session if top reps achieved.
